alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Northwest Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 12:49PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pinal County through 115 PM MST... At 1249 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Coolidge, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Florence, Coolidge, Blackwater, Magma, San Tan Valley, Randolph and Valley Farms. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 87 between mile markers 129 and 144. AZ Route 79 between mile markers 130 and 140. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Northwest Pinal County
